title: What is the element used in chewing gums which doesn't allow for the saliva to dissolve it? - Quora

response.answer_text: The main component which is the natural or in some cases artificial gum( rubber) which is the core of it. The main reason for it is to stimulate saliva not to dissolve in it. Only if it doesnot dissolve will it stay in the mouth for longer and can be used to stimulate salivary secretion for that much more time and so more work for the muscles of the mouth and face and increasing levels of concentration.
